title: Build a deep neural network in 4 mins with TensorFlow in Colab
excerpt: Google Colaboratory is a free Jupyter notebook environment that requires no setup and runs entirely in the Cloud. In this episode of Coding TensorFlow, Laurence shows us how to code, test, and train neural networks right in your browser, without having to worry about installing any kind of runtime. Watch
